content: the rustic pines cowl is a texture crochet cowl scarf this beautiful cowl uses a fun cable stitch to create the effect of trees this pattern is written for worsted weight yarn in toddler child and adult size be sure to check out the coordinating beanie pattern by @craftingforweeks or ear warmer and mittens by @theplushpineapple you will need approx 185 225 325 yards for the toddler child adult cowl pattern includes written instructions as well as link to video tutorial for special stitches
